fields.content:
This is a fun challenge between friends to see if they can pick each week a football game that does not end up nil nil.

All players are required to Register to play. Then to pick a team, before the day of the matches. See the rules for further details.
fields.title: Welcome to NoNilNil.com

fields.content:
1. Brendan's reasonable judgement is final. It's simple and it's plain. Why should I complain.
  2. This is not gambling - When The Fun Stops Stop!
  3. Pick a game involving a franchise club and you lose.
  4. To win you must be the last person standing
  5. To stay in you must pick a team where the game does not end-up nil nil.
    1. Postponed games count as nil nil.
    2. Only Premiership or League Two teams for now.
    3. Need to select a different team for each round.
    4. Re-arranged games before the date count as nil nil, - I apologise if it makes you feel bad.
  6. Once your out of a round, you must wait - spectators of the show.
  7. Rounds continue until there is a week where one and only one player avoids a nil nil. You see the winner takes it all.
    1. If all the remaining players fail to avoid a nil nil, there is a roll-over into the next game - the game is on again
    2. Buy-in is available if a game has been rolled-over. The cost for this will be £5 per round. (e.g. if there is a two round roll over you would be required to pay £10 to enter). Alternatively, you can wait until that game has been won and we start again.
  8. Payment is via cash in the short term to Brendan - depending upon the uptake I will add paypal

Did you get the Abba reference ?
fields.title: Rules - Rules must be obeyed, The judges will decide.

fields.content:
A crazy idea, plagiarised from a number of sources

Written using the Django framework with lots of python, currently running at Pythonanywhere.com

Raw passwords are stored (hashed algorithm: pbkdf2_sha256 iterations: 20000 ) #geek

Contact: Via twitter @bmsleight
